casebody.data:
IN THE MATTER OF THE CLIENT SECURITY FUND

S.W.2d

Supreme Court of ArkansasDelivered April 2, 1990 Per Curiam.

Jill R. Jacoway of Fayetteville, Arkansas, is hereby appointed to the Client Security Fund Committee replacing Dewain Hodge of Waldron, Arkansas, third congressional district. Ms. Jacoway is appointed for a term expiring July 30, 1996.

The Court expresses its gratitude to Dewain Hodge for his faithful service to the Court.
